title: Bombastic!
content:
To be frank, Le Meridian is among the best hotel in Xi'An. It's accomodation with its unique and spacious design caught my interest. The breakfast buffet also gives a huge range of choices for me to choose from and most importantly, its delicious!

Special thanks to Linda Cheng at the Premium Lounge for her warmth hospitality, bubbly attitude and her special mix for Gin and Tonic! She is one of the reason that Le Meridian is among the best hotel in my list. Keep up the good work Linda! ğŸ˜Š

title: A Good Hotel for Business Traveller! Strongly Recommend
content:
This hotel is located in the northwest of the city, very close to the high speed railway station. The highway nearby can take you to the airport in 40 mins. As a new established hotel, it also has a modern fitness center, and a quiet swimming pool on the ground floor. People could enjoy the exercises with fresh air surrounded.

Besides, as a elite member of Marriott and SPG, I chose to spend some leisure time at the executive lounge. Here are many different types of drink, snacks, and light dinner well prepared everyday.

Thanks to the staff, I also got a cocktail during the happy hour.

I believe Le Meridien is always one of the best choice to stay with during the trip.

title: æµçä¹‹å·…
content:
I went to Le Meridien Munich Hotel early.
The new hotel is open, and the hardware is very new.
The environment is at the front of the Chan Ba Peninsula, and the panoramic room is very good.
The four restaurants are nice and inexpensive.
Service is also good, the new opening price of the hotel is very cheap.
